task.summary: Default task
Fix for manage fragment listview
Code cleanup for manage fragment listview; begin work on share db via email (ManageFragment)
Fixed missing cursor exception after share in DinnerListActivity
General cleanup of DinnerListActivity / saveInstanceState work
General cleanup of DinnerListActivity / closing helpers & cursors
Handling back navigation to correct fragment in MainActivity using mFragmentTracker
Closing dbHelper and cursors in ViewDinnerActivity
Modded fetch methods in DinnersDbAdapter to fetch only needed columns
Name field now must be unique; code streamlining in AddDinnerActivity
Rewrote AddDinnerActivity save procedures; name field in db now must be unique
Additional AddDinnerActivity cleanup with opening and closing db and cursors Better commenting in DinnersDbAdapter
Palette changes
Palette changes and renaming applicationID in gradle
Bug fix: open db to delete dinners from CAB menu
Update to add unstaged files that were missed in previous commits.
Non-functional share db code removed from ManageDBFragment; commented out of arrays and strings.
Added version number to AboutAppActivity strings
Improved handling of text shared from other apps - pulls name from top of text to populate name field
Added TAG variable to use for all Log.d calls
Added TAG variable to use for all Log.d calls
Added TAG variable to use for all Log.d calls
Added TAG variable to use for all Log.d calls
New feature: added CAB hint button to DinnerListActivity
Bug fix: applied custom style to keyword search dialog
Added dashes to CAB share for multiple recipes so there's a set of dashes between recipes in the text block
Cleaned up completed Todo notes
Updated app with keystore info
Added preferences.xml and updated strings.xml
Updates to build.gradle
Bare bones creation of new SettingsActivity and SettingsFragment
SettingsActivity: parent activity and action bar setup
Added code to ViewDinnerActivity to check SharedPreferences for screen timeout info Added initialization of SharedPreferences to MainActivity onCreate()
Refined code to ViewDinnerActivity - now checks SharedPreferences onResume() Added settings to menu for ViewDinnerActivity
Implemented pro user mode preference; added to DinnerListActivity
Added help tip to ViewDinnerActivity, toggled by pro user mode preference
Added choice of image scaling to preferences (three sizes) Implemented scaling option in ViewDinnerActivity both onCreate and onResume Updated ViewDinnerActivity layout so image is always flush left

MESSAGE.value: Name field now must be unique; code streamlining in AddDinnerActivity
Rewrote AddDinnerActivity save procedures; name field in db now must be unique
Additional AddDinnerActivity cleanup with opening and closing db and cursors Better commenting in DinnersDbAdapter
Palette changes and renaming applicationID in gradle
Bug fix: open db to delete dinners from CAB menu
Update to add unstaged files that were missed in previous commits.
Non-functional share db code removed from ManageDBFragment; commented out of arrays and strings.
Added version number to AboutAppActivity strings
Improved handling of text shared from other apps - pulls name from top of text to populate name field
Added TAG variable to use for all Log.d calls
New feature: added CAB hint button to DinnerListActivity
Bug fix: applied custom style to keyword search dialog
Added dashes to CAB share for multiple recipes so there's a set of dashes between recipes in the text block
Cleaned up completed Todo notes
Updated app with keystore info
Added preferences.xml and updated strings.xml
Updates to build.gradle
Bare bones creation of new SettingsActivity and SettingsFragment
SettingsActivity: parent activity and action bar setup
Added code to ViewDinnerActivity to check SharedPreferences for screen timeout info
Added code to ViewDinnerActivity to check SharedPreferences for screen timeout info Added initialization of SharedPreferences to MainActivity onCreate()
Refined code to ViewDinnerActivity - now checks SharedPreferences onResume() Added settings to menu for ViewDinnerActivity
Implemented pro user mode preference; added to DinnerListActivity
Added help tip to ViewDinnerActivity, toggled by pro user mode preference
Added choice of image scaling to preferences (three sizes) Implemented scaling option in ViewDinnerActivity both onCreate and onResume Updated ViewDinnerActivity layout so image is always flush left

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added choice of image scaling to preferences (three sizes) Implemented scaling option in ViewDinnerActivity both onCreate and onResume Updated ViewDinnerActivity layout so image is always flush left
